trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_010<tab>There is doubtless much I can learn from work as a bounty hunter─especially with Taynor as my guide.
TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_020<tab>What? With our methods, we can barely maintain a faint connection to the Thirteenth...but you say that you've journeyed there!? Incredible...

TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_021<tab>Such drive Archon Y'shtola must have to uncover the secrets of cross-rift travel. And to conceive of creating an artificial Atomos could only be described as inspired.

TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_022<tab>Suffice it to say, I should like nothing more than to join you on your future forays, but I will abide in patience for now. You already have a capable guide at your disposal, and my presence would be extraneous.
TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_023<tab>Besides, there are certain tasks that require me to be here in the First.

TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_024<tab>For one, I wish to learn more about the approach used to revive the Empty. 'Tis my hope that the selfsame can be applied in the Thirteenth, and to that end, I have arranged to meet with those involved.

TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_030<tab>Zeromus...? He was a great hero of eld, beloved by all. Never did I imagine his name would live again after ten thousand years. Fitting that another who bears it might aid us, even if only by way of a memoria crystal.

TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_031<tab>That it should be wielded by this Zero is both reassuring and encouraging. To know that we are not alone in our endeavor makes our work here in the First all the more important.

TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_032<tab>Speaking of which, I recently spoke with your comrades returned from the Empty. Only Urianger could have arrived at a solution as ingenious as primal summoning.

TEXT_REGNOR4UNUKALHAI_00700_UNUKALHAI_000_033<tab>Ryne and Gaia are quite the formidable pair, aren't they? Skilled combatants gifted with command over Light and Dark. Were their strength not crucial to the First's restoration, I would ask that they join us when we return to the Thirteenth.
